content:
嗨, 各位

請問是否存在一種 Resource 可以關連儀器、檢查項目與藥物呢?
情境是我想在網頁上選擇一個儀器而系統自動帶出這個儀器所支持的檢查項目。
(如何透過 Resource 表達儀器與檢查項目的關係呢？使用 CodeSystem 嗎？)

進一步了解，如果我選擇某一個檢查項目，系統要能帶出這個檢查項目所對應的藥物清單。
(可以透過什麼 Resource 表達檢查項目與藥物的關係呢)

謝謝

Clark's question is :
How to represent mappings between Lab instruments/devices and tests/medications using FHIR resources?
Also including representation of relationships between lab tests and medications.

A question about knowledge representation, right?

Related Link:
http://build.fhir.org/clinicalreasoning-knowledge-artifact-representation.html

Other links:
Project Summary for LOINC - IVD Test Code (LIVD) Mapping
https://www.hl7.org/special/Committees/projman/searchableProjectIndex.cfm?action=edit&ProjectNumber=1335

IICC (IVD Industry Connectivity Consortium)
https://ivdconnectivity.org/
CodeSystem and/or ValueSet may be suitable resources.
@Clark Many LOINC Drug/Toxicology terms are actually drug specific tests.

@Lin Zhang

Roger that

Thank your response.
The Library Resource perhaps gave me a good idea.
but i need re-express my Question.

There a scenario is when we scan cancers, we could use some modality device, like gamma camera, PET, PET/CT, MRI ...
the different device has difference examinations, such as
Gamma Camera used for "Whole body bone scan, Myocardial Perfusion Scan, Cerebral perfusion can, ..."

When the Users use HIS, the system should pre-load some context, like device is to examination.
But I think Device Resource defined by patient-centri or human-centri, there are not any attribute could relate others Examination.
Are there any Resources fit my require or could I custom resources relationship?

(中文翻譯)
您好, 有個情境是當我們要掃描癌症時，通常會使用一些核子醫學儀器，像是伽瑪攝影機, PET, PET/CT, MRI 等等
不同的裝置有不同的檢查項目像是
"伽瑪攝影機" 可以用於全身骨骼掃描、心肌灌注掃描、腦血流掃描等等

當(醫療從業)使用者使用 HIS 時，系統應該自動載入一些背景資訊，像是他選擇了「伽瑪攝影機」系統應該帶出相關的檢查(全身骨骼掃描、心肌灌注掃描、腦血流掃描)。
以 Device resource 為例，我想他是以人為本的定義方式沒有一個屬性可以關連到其他的檢查項目。
那麼有 Resource 可符合我的需求嗎 (像是您提的 CodeSystem or Library Resource) ? 或是可以自定義 Resource 與 Resource 的關聯呢?

Sorry I'm Late :"(

LOINC/RSNA Radiology Playbook should be a useful resource for your scenario.

Regenstrief and the RSNA are working together to unify radiology procedures in LOINC and RadLex
https://loinc.org/collaboration/rsna/

Search RadLex Playbook
http://playbook.radlex.org/playbook/SearchRadlexAction

RadLex Playbook
http://dev2.rsna.org/RadLex_Playbook.aspx
Again, CodeSystem and/or ValueSet may be suitable for this.

A publication:
Journal of Digital Imaging
February 2018, Volume 31, Issue 1, pp 124–132 | Cite as
Single-Center Experience Implementing the LOINC-RSNA Radiology Playbook for Adult Abdomen/Pelvis CT and MR Procedures Using a Semi-Automated Method
https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007%2Fs10278-017-0016-0
